messages.m1: ```sql UPDATE testing.result r SET successfully = false FROM testing.test t WHERE r.invest_id = :investId::uuid AND r.test_id = t.id AND t.type = :testType::testing.test_type AND r.successfully = true RETURNING r.id as id, r.successfully as successfully, r.test_id as test_id, r.invest_id as invest_id, r.inserted as inserted ```
